scripts.eas-build-pre-install: set -eu; echo '[patch] checking RN gradle plugin...'; for F in node_modules/react-native/node_modules/@react-native/gradle-plugin/react-native-gradle-plugin/build.gradle.kts node_modules/@react-native/gradle-plugin/react-native-gradle-plugin/build.gradle.kts; do if [ -f "$F" ]; then echo "[patch] -> $F"; sed -i '/org\.gradle\.configurationcache\.extensions\.serviceOf/d' "$F"; grep -q 'org.gradle.kotlin.dsl.support.serviceOf' "$F" || sed -i '1s;^;import org.gradle.kotlin.dsl.support.serviceOf\n;' "$F"; sed -i 's/gradle\.serviceOf</serviceOf</g' "$F"; fi; done; echo '[patch] done.'
